#### install()

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function install(source, options): Promise<InstallResult>;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/install.ts:220](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/8ee270017a39f3e45061a948cab71b38a752f335/packages/core/src/operations/install.ts#L220)

Install an extension from a source.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| ------ | ------ | ------ |
| `source` | [`InstallSource`](#installsource) | Installation source |
| `options` | [`InstallOptions`](#installoptions) | Installation options |

#### Returns

`Promise`\<[`InstallResult`](#installresult)\>

Installation result

#### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// Install from GitHub
const source = parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
const result = await install(source, { projectDir: "." });
console.log(`Installed ${result.extension.id.name}`);

// Install with progress tracking
await install(source, {
  projectDir: ".",
  onProgress: ({ phase, message }) => console.log(`[${phase}] ${message}`),
});
```

#### parseInstallSource()

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function parseInstallSource(input): InstallSource;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/install.ts:104](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/8ee270017a39f3e45061a948cab71b38a752f335/packages/core/src/operations/install.ts#L104)

Parse an install source string.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| ------ | ------ | ------ |
| `input` | `string` | Source string (GitHub ref, URL, or local path) |

#### Returns

[`InstallSource`](#installsource)

Parsed InstallSource

#### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// GitHub reference
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
// { type: "github", owner: "quarto-ext", repo: "fontawesome", version: { type: "latest" } }

// GitHub with version
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/lightbox@v1.0.0");
// { type: "github", ..., version: { type: "tag", tag: "v1.0.0" } }

// URL
parseInstallSource("https://example.com/ext.zip");
// { type: "url", url: "https://example.com/ext.zip" }

// Local path
parseInstallSource("./my-extension");
// { type: "local", path: "./my-extension" }
```
